S.FORM: == Losing Yagu 與 Loba Umaw Tanga Watan ﹙因為 Loba 父母已不在世﹚告訴他的姪女說:Loba ,Losing ,Losing Losing ,Tanga Watan Loba 已被上部落的Losing Loba Losing, Topaw Nokan 與下部落的 Batu Nomin Batu Cyang Tanga Watan ﹙ Loba ,Topaw Nokan (b'nux cingan)來解決,( ,當Tanga Watan Batu Rukul , Hola Turay ,Batu Rukul Topaw Nokan Tanga Watan Batu Nomin gaga ,Tanga Watan Losing Yagu ,在Tayal gaga, gaga gaga, bnux cingan,敲鐘的平台.

== Losing Yago 與 Loba Umaw Tanga Watan ﹙因為 Loba 父母已不在世﹚告訴他的姪女說:Loba ,Losing ,Losing Losing ,Tanga Watan Loba 已被上部落的Losing Loba Losing, Topaw Nokan 與下部落的 Bato Nomin Bato Cyang Tanga Watan ﹙ Loba ,Topaw Nokan (b'nox cingan)來解決,( ,當Tanga Watan Bato Rokol , Hola Toray ,Bato Rokol Topaw Nokan Tanga Watan Bato Nomin gaga ,Tanga Watan Losing Yago ,在Tayal gaga, gaga gaga, bnox cingan,敲鐘的平台.
